# Unit Conversion Commands
*Created by [Lazloz](https://twitch.tv/lazloz)*

Enhance your Twitch chat with automatic unit conversions using Streamer.bot. These commands detect units in chat messages and instantly post the conversion, making it easier for international viewers to understand measurements without having to look them up.

For example, if a user posts "I weigh 100kg," the bot will respond with "100kg are around 220.5lbs."

## How to import
1. Open Streamer.bot.
2. Click the import button.
3. Paste the desired import string from below.
4. Click import.

## All-in-One import
This string has conversion for the following groups: 
- Kilograms and Pounds
- Meters and Feet
- Liters and Gallons
- Celsius and Fahrenheit
- Kilometers and Miles
- Grams and Ounces

```

```

## Temperatures only
This string has conversion for the following groups: 
- Celsius and Fahrenheit

```

```

## Distances only
This string has conversion for the following groups: 
- Meters and Feet
- Kilometers and Miles

```

```

## Weights only
This string has conversion for the following groups: 
- Kilograms and Pounds
- Grams and Ounces

```

```

## Volume only
This string has conversion for the following groups: 
- Liters and Gallons

```

```
